GUI

Class BattlefieldController

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.BattlefieldController

  • public class BattlefieldController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class to handle the Graphical User Interface for the Battlefield
    Author:
    magnubau, williad

    • Field Summary

      handles the attackButton.

      Method that runs when the player has finished attacking a monster
      boolean checkForPlayerTurn()
      Checks if it is game.playerCharacters turn.
      void closeMapMoveEventHandler()
      disables mapMoveEventHandler so that a user cannot move its Character when it is not supposed to.

      Disable all buttons
      void enableAllButtons()
      Enables all buttons

      Ends the turn.

      Shows defeat screen, closes all timers and goes to Main Menu.

      Method that runs when the Help-button has been pressed

      Hides the VBox used for level-transition and game over

      Hides the movementpane
      void initialize()
      Method that executes when the corresponding FXML-file for this Controller is loaded
      void initLevelTransitionVbox()
      Initializes the VBox that appears when the level is cleared
      This VBox is also used when the game is lost
      void initMovementPane()
      Initializes the movementpane for the player
      This pane is used to visualize how far the player can move on the map

      Handles moveButton.
      void moveFinished()
      Method that runs when the player performed a move-action

      Method that runs to transition to the next level.

      Updates the position of a pawn if it is not equal to the position to the corresponding Creature.

      Showns transition screen after levels or when the game is lost
      void showMovementPane()
      Makes the movementpane visible to the player
      boolean update()
      Method that updates the Battlefield
      This method serves as one Battlefield-cycle

      Updates data from game.
      void updateImage()
      Updates the portrait image of the player-character

      Method that runs when the first weapon-button is selected

    • Constructor Detail

      • BattlefieldController

        public BattlefieldController()
        A constructor for the BattlefieldController. Creates an instance of the game class.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Method that executes when the corresponding FXML-file for this Controller is loaded

      • attackButtonPressed

        public void attackButtonPressed()
        handles the attackButton. When attackButton is pressed, all other buttons are diabled. All attackPanes for monsters that can be attacked are set to visible. Pressing attackButton again sets all attackPanes invisible and all other Buttons are enabled.

      • attackFinished

        public void attackFinished()
        Method that runs when the player has finished attacking a monster

      • moveButtonPressed

        public void moveButtonPressed()
        Handles moveButton. When moveButton is pressed, all other buttons are disabled. the movementPane is set to visible. If the moveButton is pressed again, the movementPane is set to disabled and all other buttons are enabled.

      • moveFinished

        public void moveFinished()
        Method that runs when the player performed a move-action

      • endTurnButtonPressed

        public void endTurnButtonPressed()
        Ends the turn. All buttons are disabled.

      • helpButtonPressed

        public void helpButtonPressed()
        Method that runs when the Help-button has been pressed

      • openMapMoveEventHandler

        public void openMapMoveEventHandler()
        enables mapMoveEventHandler so that a user can move its Character.

      • closeMapMoveEventHandler

        public void closeMapMoveEventHandler()
        disables mapMoveEventHandler so that a user cannot move its Character when it is not supposed to.

      • updateGame

        public void updateGame()
        Updates data from game.

      • refreshViewFromGame

        public void refreshViewFromGame()
        Updates the position of a pawn if it is not equal to the position to the corresponding Creature. It also updates the weapons and health points from game.

      • update

        public boolean update()
        Method that updates the Battlefield
        This method serves as one Battlefield-cycle
        Returns:
        false if current level is cleared, otherwise true

      • newLevel

        public void newLevel()
        Changes to new level. Resets usead actions.

      • checkForPlayerTurn

        public boolean checkForPlayerTurn()
        Checks if it is game.playerCharacters turn. Disables all buttons if not game.playerCharacteers turn. Enables all buttons if it is. Also disables buttons when its action is used.
        Returns:

      • initMovementPane

        public void initMovementPane()
        Initializes the movementpane for the player
        This pane is used to visualize how far the player can move on the map

      • showMovementPane

        public void showMovementPane()
        Makes the movementpane visible to the player

      • hideMovementPane

        public void hideMovementPane()
        Hides the movementpane

      • weaponOneSelected

        public void weaponOneSelected()
        Method that runs when the first weapon-button is selected

      • weaponTwoSelected

        public void weaponTwoSelected()
        Method that runs when the second weapon-button is selected

      • updateImage

        public void updateImage()
        Updates the portrait image of the player-character

      • initLevelTransitionVbox

        public void initLevelTransitionVbox()
        Initializes the VBox that appears when the level is cleared
        This VBox is also used when the game is lost

      • showLevelTransitionVbox

        public void showLevelTransitionVbox()
        Showns transition screen after levels or when the game is lost

      • hideLevelTransitionVbox

        public void hideLevelTransitionVbox()
        Hides the VBox used for level-transition and game over

      • enableAllButtons

        public void enableAllButtons()
        Enables all buttons

      • disableAllButtons

        public void disableAllButtons()
        Disable all buttons

      • nextLevelTransition

        public void nextLevelTransition()
        Method that runs to transition to the next level.
        This method makes the transitionVBox appear

      • gameOverTransition

        public void gameOverTransition()
        Shows defeat screen, closes all timers and goes to Main Menu.
